name: 林鈞陶
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解離散時間訊號處理之知識，包含 Z - 轉換、連續訊號取樣、線性非時變系統、濾波器設計、離散傅立葉轉換以及快速傅立葉轉換等。
schedule:
(subject to change based on class progress) (Updated)
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2-3: Discrete-Time Signals and Systems
Week 4-5: Fourier Series and Fourier Transform
Week 6: Midterm I
Week 7-8: Discrete-Time Fourier Transform (DTFT)
Week 9-10: Sampling of Continuous-Time Signals
Week 11-12: Z-Transform and Digital Filter Design
Week 13-14: Discrete Fourier transform (DFT) and Fast Fourier transform (FFT)
Week 15: Midterm II
Week 16-18: Final Project
scorePolicy:
Quizzes (Weekly): 20%
Midterm I: 25%
Midterm II: 25%
Final project: 30%
所有考試基本上為 open book
materials:
1. A. V. Oppenheim and R. W. Schafer, Discrete-time signal processing, 3rd edition, Pearson, 2010.
2.  Slides
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
